name: CzyChat Server
short_description:
CzyChat is a client-server based chat system.

This project is the server part of the CzyChat system and therefore the heart of the system. 
It is written in C++.

CzyChat is a client-server based chat system similar to IRC. Users can chat in channels (chat rooms) and via private conversations. Therefore the clients have to be connected to a CzyChat chat server. The chat server can be administrated via common client connection, console interface, CCE scripting and RCON. See the readme files for a much more detailed feature list.

It's my attempt to develop such a chat system on my own. I could not find any "more advanced" (means which go beyond just being only a basic example sourcecode for teaching sockets or similarities) similar client-server chat systems written in C++ so I thought it would be helpful to release it here on SourceForge. As a developer you can use this for example as a base for your own chat system, so you don't need to start from scratch.
summary: CzyChat server components written in C++
